test_100_bytes_udp_dns_single_packet()

test_184_bytes_udp_dhcpv6()
test_100_bytes_udp_skype_eth_padding()

This is a test for a bug. Due to old limitations, the minimum len of a frame is 64 bytes, in case that the frame is shorter than 64 bytes the ethernet header is padding zeros at the END of the packet (and not where the ethernet header is located in the packet structure).

test_120_bytes_udp_skype_eth_padding()

This is a test for a bug. Due to old limitations, the minimum len of a frame is 64 bytes, in case that the frame is shorter than 64 bytes the ethernet header is padding zeros at the END of the packet (and not where the ethernet header is located in the packet structure).
